app.title: Vannamayil thangamaligai
app.welcome: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your business today.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your business today.
dashboard.loadDataError: Failed to load dashboard data. Please try again.
dashboard.invalidTransactionData: Invalid transaction data. Cannot generate PDF.
dashboard.invoicePDFDownloadError: Failed to generate invoice PDF. Please try again.
dashboard.billPDFDownloadError: Failed to generate bill PDF. Please try again.
dashboard.selectDateRangeDescription: Select a date range to filter your dashboard data
dashboard.startDateAfterEndDate: Start date cannot be after end date
dashboard.endDateBeforeStartDate: End date cannot be before start date
dashboard.startDateFuture: Start date cannot be in the future
dashboard.endDateFuture: End date cannot be in the future

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.subtitle: Manage your gold jewelry inventory and stock levels
inventory.searchPlaceholder: Search products by name, SKU, or barcode...
inventory.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
inventory.generateBarcodeHint: Generate a barcode based on the product name
inventory.barcodeInputTitle: Scan the barcode or type manually. Press Enter to process.
inventory.barcodeAlreadyExists: Barcode "{{barcode}}" already exists. Please use a different barcode.
inventory.loadError: Failed to load products. Please try again.
inventory.productAddError: Failed to add product. Please try again.
inventory.productUpdateError: Failed to update product. Please try again.
inventory.productDeleteCascadeSuccess: Product deleted successfully! References have been removed from bills and invoices.
inventory.productDeleteError: Failed to delete product. Please try again.
inventory.productDeleteCascadeError: Failed to delete product even with cascade. Please try again.
inventory.deleteReferencesMessage: This product is referenced in {{bills}} bill(s) and {{invoices}} invoice(s). Do you want to delete it anyway? This will remove the product references from bills and invoices.
inventory.categoryNamePlaceholder: Enter category name (e.g., Pendants, Coins, Sets)
inventory.categoryNameHint: Enter a unique category name. It will be available for all products.
inventory.confirmDeleteCategory: Are you sure you want to delete the category "{{category}}"? This action cannot be undone.
inventory.cannotDeleteInUse: Cannot delete category that is in use by products
inventory.productNameMinLength: Product name must be at least 2 characters
inventory.skuMinLength: SKU must be at least 2 characters
inventory.huidMinLength: HUID must be at least 3 characters
inventory.weightRequired: Weight is required and must be greater than 0
inventory.stockQuantityRequired: Stock quantity is required and must be 0 or greater
inventory.minStockLevelRequired: Minimum stock level is required and must be 0 or greater
inventory.barcodeInvalid: Barcode format is invalid. Use only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores
inventory.noCustomCategoriesYet: No custom categories yet. Add one above!

billing.title: Billing & Invoicing
billing.subtitle: Create and manage invoices for your customers
billing.addAtLeastOneItem: Please add at least one item to the invoice
billing.selectCustomerOrEnter: Please select a customer or enter customer details
billing.scanInstructions: Point your barcode scanner at the product or manually enter the barcode
billing.customerPayAdditional: Customer needs to pay additional amount
billing.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
billing.phoneInvalid: Phone number must be exactly 10 digits
billing.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
billing.taxPercentageInvalid: Tax percentage must be between 0 and 100
billing.discountAmountInvalid: Discount amount must be a positive number
billing.amountPaidInvalid: Amount paid must be a positive number
billing.amountPaidExceedsTotal: Amount paid cannot exceed total amount
billing.billSavedSuccess: Bill saved successfully and inventory updated!
billing.exchangeBillSavedSuccess: Exchange bill saved successfully and inventory updated!
billing.billSaveError: Failed to save bill. Please try again.

billing.selectOrEnterCustomer: Please select or enter customer information
billing.customerCreateError: Failed to create customer. Please try again.
billing.scanBarcodeOrType: Scan barcode or type manually. Press Enter to process.
billing.billPDFDownloadError: Failed to generate bill PDF. Please try again.
billing.invoicePDFDownloadError: Failed to generate invoice PDF. Please try again.
billing.addExchangeItemsBeforePDF: Please add exchange items before viewing the PDF
billing.rateRequiredForItem: Rate is required for item "{{product}}". Please enter a valid rate.
billing.makingChargeRequiredForItem: Making charge is required for item "{{product}}". Please enter the making charge (0 if none).
billing.wastageRequiredForItem: Wastage is required for item "{{product}}". Please enter the wastage in grams (0 if none).
billing.paymentMethodRequired: Payment Method is required. Please select a payment method.
billing.amountPaidRequired: Amount Paid is required. Please enter the amount paid.
billing.paymentStatusRequired: Payment Status is required. Please select a payment status.

billing.confirmDeleteCustomer: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.
billing.nameAndPhoneRequired: Name and phone number are required fields

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your application preferences and business settings
settings.photoRequirements: JPG, GIF or PNG. Max size 2MB
settings.includeMakingChargesInTax: Include making charges in tax calculation
settings.irreversibleActions: These actions are irreversible. Please be careful.
settings.futureUpdates: This section will be available in future updates.
settings.confirmDeleteUser: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
settings.fillAllRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields
settings.passwordRequiredNewUsers: Password is required for new users
settings.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters long
settings.noPermissionUserManagement: You don't have permission to access user management.

settings.onlySuperadminChangePassword: Only Superadmin can change Superadmin passwords
settings.onlySuperadminDeleteSuperadmin: Only Superadmin can delete Superadmin users
settings.superadminCannotChangeOwnRole: Superadmin cannot change their own role

settings.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields (Name, Address, Phone)
settings.failedToSaveBusinessInfo: Failed to save business information. Please try again.
settings.allDataExportedSuccess: All data exported successfully! {{totalRecords}} records exported.

settings.failedToExportCustomers: Failed to export customers. Please try again.
settings.failedToExportProducts: Failed to export products. Please try again.
settings.dataImportCompleted: Data import completed! {{importedCount}} out of {{totalRecords}} records imported successfully.

settings.invalidFileFormatCustomers: Invalid file format. No customers found.
settings.invalidFileFormatInvoices: Invalid file format. No invoices found.

settings.invalidFileFormatExchangeBills: Invalid file format. No exchange bills found.
settings.failedToImportData: Failed to import data. Please check the file format and try again.
settings.restoreDataFromDriveMessage: This will replace your current products, customers, invoices, and bills with the data from your latest backup in Google Drive. This action cannot be undone.
settings.clearAllDataMessage: This will permanently delete all products, customers, invoices, and bills from this system.
settings.clearAllDataWarning: This action cannot be undone. Make sure you have exported or backed up your data before continuing.
settings.connectGoogleDriveDescription: Connect your Google Drive account to automatically sync your data backup as an Excel file.
settings.googleDriveSyncedDescription: Your data will be synced to Google Drive as an Excel file. You can view and edit it directly in Drive.
settings.dataSyncedToDrive: Data synced to Google Drive successfully!
settings.pleaseConnectGoogleDrive: Please connect to Google Drive first
settings.googleDriveSessionExpired: Your Google Drive session has expired. Please reconnect.
settings.failedToSyncToDrive: Failed to sync to Google Drive. Please try again.
settings.noBackupFileFound: No backup file found in Google Drive. Please sync first.
settings.restoredItemsSuccessfully: Restored {{successCount}} items successfully. {{errorCount}} items failed. Check console for details.
settings.successfullyRestoredItems: Successfully restored {{successCount}} items from Google Drive!
settings.failedToRestoreFromDrive: Failed to restore from Google Drive. Please try again.
settings.exportDataDescription: Export your data in Excel format for backup purposes or data migration.
settings.importDataDescription: Import data from previously exported Excel files. Make sure the file format matches the export format.
settings.clearedDataWithErrors: Cleared {{deletedCount}} items, but {{errorCount}} items failed to delete.
settings.allDataClearedSuccess: All data cleared successfully! {{deletedCount}} items deleted.
settings.failedToClearData: Failed to clear data. Please try again.
